user.description: Enter your api_key, start station, a name, and optionally a line id and a list of missions

data.name: Name
data.mission: Missions ids (4 letters code, for multiple use a comma separated list)

error.unauthorized: The Api key is not valid

abort.already_configured: An entity with the same name and start station is already configured
